name: Losing time (letrickster)
description:
Summary:

Losing Time is a game about a girl who's really not sure where she fits in. Maybe because she doesn't belong in a place or a time, but with a person.

Made for the 2020 Yuri Game Jam, may be updated in the future to expand on the story.

  • 4 Endings
  • Original art and story
  • Original music
Credits:

Clive Green - Backgrounds, GUI
@tonypayment - GUI, character art, music, programming, writing, all that jazz
